definition: feeling or showing great surprise or astonishment
definition_translation: sentimento o mostrare grande sorpresa o meraviglia
example: I was amazed by the beauty of the Grand Canyon.
example_translation: Ero meravigliato dalla bellezza del Grand Canyon.

definition: extremely surprising or impressive
definition_translation: estremamente sorprendente o impressionante
example: The fireworks display was amazing.
example_translation: Lo spettacolo di fuochi d'artificio era incredibile.

definition: in an angry or irritated manner
definition_translation: in modo arrabbiato o irritato
example: He spoke angrily to his brother.
example_translation: Ha parlato adirato a suo fratello.

definition: feeling irritated or impatient
definition_translation: sentimento irritato o impaziente
example: I was annoyed by the noise from the construction site.
example_translation: Ero seccato dal rumore del cantiere edile.

definition: causing irritation or annoyance
definition_translation: causando irritazione o fastidio
example: The mosquito buzzing around my ear was annoying.
example_translation: Il rumore del moscerino attorno alla mia orecchia era seccante.

definition: feeling worried or nervous
definition_translation: sentimento preoccupato o nervoso
example: I was anxious about the upcoming exam.
example_translation: Ero ansioso sull'esame imminente.

definition: showing courage or strength
definition_translation: mostrando coraggio o forza
example: The firefighter was brave during the rescue mission.
example_translation: Il pompiere è stato coraggioso durante la missione di soccorso.

definition: in a brave or courageous manner
definition_translation: in modo coraggioso o valoroso
example: She bravely spoke out against the injustice.
example_translation: Ha parlato coraggiosamente contro l'ingiustizia.

definition: exceptionally talented or impressive
definition_translation: eccezionalmente talentuoso o impressionante
example: The brilliant scientist discovered a new cure.
example_translation: Lo scienziato brillante ha scoperto una nuova cura.

definition: peaceful and quiet in nature or tone
definition_translation: paceful e tranquillo di natura o tono
example: The calm atmosphere helped me relax.
example_translation: L'atmosfera calmata mi ha aiutato a rilassarmi.

definition: having or showing a lack of concern or worry
definition_translation: avendo o mostrando una mancanza di preoccupazione o ansia
example: The carefree child played happily in the park.
example_translation: Il bambino spensierato giocava felicemente nel parco.

definition: not giving enough attention or care
definition_translation: non dando abbastanza attenzione o cura
example: He was careless with his belongings and lost his phone.
example_translation: Era negligente con i suoi oggetti e ha perso il telefono.

definition: pleasantly attractive or engaging
definition_translation: piacevolmente attraente o intrigante
example: The charming actor won the hearts of the audience.
example_translation: L'attore incantevole ha conquistato il cuore del pubblico.

definition: having or showing a pleasant and optimistic outlook
definition_translation: avendo o mostrando un outlook piacevole e ottimista
example: The cheerful music lifted everyone's spirits.
example_translation: La musica allegra ha sollevato lo spirito di tutti.

definition: having a low temperature
definition_translation: avendo una temperatura bassa
example: The cold winter air made my skin feel numb.
example_translation: L'aria fredda dell'inverno mi faceva sentire la pelle intorpidita.

definition: unable to think clearly or understand something
definition_translation: incapace di pensare chiaramente o capire qualcosa
example: I was confused by the complex instructions.
example_translation: Ero confuso dalle istruzioni complesse.

definition: having the ability to create new or original ideas
definition_translation: avendo la capacità di creare idee nuove o originali
example: The creative artist designed a beautiful painting.
example_translation: L'artista creativo ha disegnato un bellissimo dipinto.

definition: causing pain or suffering to others
definition_translation: causando dolore o sofferenza agli altri
example: The cruel dictator oppressed his people.
example_translation: Il dittatore crudele ha oppresso il suo popolo.

definition: having a desire to learn or know about something
definition_translation: avendo un desiderio di imparare o sapere qualcosa
example: The curious child asked many questions.
example_translation: Il bambino curioso ha fatto molte domande.

definition: in a curious or inquiring manner
definition_translation: in modo curioso o inquisito
example: She looked curiously at the strange object.
example_translation: Ha guardato curiosamente l'oggetto strano.

definition: feeling or showing great pleasure or enjoyment
definition_translation: sentimento o mostrando grande piacere o godimento
example: I was delighted with the surprise party.
example_translation: Ero deliziato con la festa a sorpresa.

definition: feeling sad or unhappy
definition_translation: sentimento triste o infelice
example: He was depressed after losing his job.
example_translation: Era depresso dopo aver perso il lavoro.

definition: feeling unhappy or let down
definition_translation: sentimento infelice o deluso
example: I was disappointed by the movie's ending.
example_translation: Ero deluso dalla fine del film.

definition: causing disappointment or dissatisfaction
definition_translation: causando delusione o insoddisfazione
example: The disappointing news made me feel sad.
example_translation: La notizia deludente mi ha fatto sentire triste.

definition: having a calm and relaxed nature
definition_translation: avendo una natura calma e rilassata
example: He was an easy-going person who got along with everyone.
example_translation: Era una persona facile che andava d'accordo con tutti.

definition: feeling ashamed or self-conscious
definition_translation: sentimento umiliato o consapevole di sé
example: I was embarrassed by my mistake.
example_translation: Ero imbarazzato dal mio errore.

definition: causing embarrassment or shame
definition_translation: causando imbarazzo o vergogna
example: The embarrassing moment was caught on camera.
example_translation: Il momento imbarazzante è stato ripreso dalle telecamere.

definition: giving pleasure or enjoyment
definition_translation: dando piacere o godimento
example: The enjoyable music made me want to dance.
example_translation: La musica piacevole mi ha fatto venir voglia di ballare.

definition: in an excited or enthusiastic manner
definition_translation: in modo entusiasta o eccitato
example: She spoke excitedly about her upcoming vacation.
example_translation: Ha parlato con entusiasmo della sua vacanza imminente.

definition: extremely tired or drained of energy
definition_translation: estremamente stanco o privo di energia
example: I was exhausted after the long hike.
example_translation: Ero esausto dopo la lunga escursione.

definition: having knowledge or skill gained from practice or training
definition_translation: avendo conoscenza o abilità acquistate dalla pratica o allenamento
example: The experienced doctor performed the surgery with ease.
example_translation: Il dottore esperto ha eseguito l'intervento chirurgico con facilità.

definition: prone to forgetting things
definition_translation: predisposto a dimenticare le cose
example: I'm forgetful and often misplace my keys.
example_translation: Sono dimenticante e spesso perdo le mie chiavi.

definition: feeling fear or alarm
definition_translation: sentimento paura o allarme
example: The child was frightened by the loud noise.
example_translation: Il bambino era spaventato dal rumore forte.

definition: willing to give freely of one's time, money, or resources
definition_translation: disposto a dare liberamente del proprio tempo, denaro o risorse
example: The generous donor gave millions to the charity.
example_translation: Il donatore generoso ha dato milioni alla beneficenza.

definition: having or showing a mild and kind nature
definition_translation: avendo o mostrando una natura mite e gentile
example: The gentle mother soothed her crying baby.
example_translation: La madre gentile ha calmato il suo bebè piangente.

definition: feeling or showing appreciation or thanks
definition_translation: sentimento o mostrando apprezzamento o ringraziamento
example: I'm grateful for your help.
example_translation: Sono grato per il tuo aiuto.

definition: responsible or culpable for a wrongdoing
definition_translation: responsabile o colpevole per una azione sbagliata
example: The guilty defendant was sentenced to prison.
example_translation: Il colpevole imputato è stato condannato alla prigione.

definition: in a happy or joyful manner
definition_translation: in modo felice o gioioso
example: They lived happily ever after.
example_translation: Hanno vissuto felicemente dopo.

definition: providing assistance or support
definition_translation: fornendo assistenza o sostegno
example: The helpful guide showed us the way.
example_translation: La guida utile ci ha mostrato la strada.

definition: having or showing a feeling of expectation or desire
definition_translation: avendo o mostrando un sentimento di aspettativa o desiderio
example: The hopeful athlete trained hard for the competition.
example_translation: L'atleta speranzoso si è allenato duramente per la competizione.

definition: having no hope; feeling or showing that there is no possibility of improvement or success
definition_translation: senza speranza; sentimento o dimostrazione che non c'è possibilità di miglioramento o successo
example: The team was hopeless after losing the championship game.
example_translation: La squadra era disperata dopo aver perso la finale del campionato.

definition: to cause physical or emotional pain to someone or something
definition_translation: causare dolore fisico o emotivo a qualcuno o qualcosa
example: She hurt her ankle during the game.
example_translation: Si è ferita alla caviglia durante la partita.

definition: having a strong feeling of love or affection for someone
definition_translation: avere un forte sentimento d'amore o affetto per qualcuno
example: They are in love and getting married next year.
example_translation: Sono innamorati e si sposano l'anno prossimo.

definition: crying or having tears in one's eyes, usually due to sadness or emotional pain
definition_translation: piangendo o avendo lacrime negli occhi, di solito a causa di tristezza o dolore emotivo
example: She was in tears after hearing the sad news.
example_translation: Era in lacrime dopo aver sentito la notizia triste.

definition: having the ability to learn, understand, and think about things in a logical and creative way
definition_translation: avere la capacità di imparare, capire e pensare alle cose in modo logico e creativo
example: He is an intelligent student who always gets high grades.
example_translation: È uno studente intelligente che ottiene sempre voti alti.

definition: feeling or showing an unreasonable desire to have something that someone else has
definition_translation: sentimento o dimostrazione di un desiderio irragionevole di avere qualcosa che appartiene a qualcun altro
example: He became jealous when he saw his girlfriend talking to another guy.
example_translation: È diventato geloso quando ha visto la sua ragazza parlare con un altro ragazzo.

definition: showing a strong and enthusiastic interest in something
definition_translation: mostrando un forte e entusiasta interesse per qualcosa
example: She is keen on playing tennis and practices every day.
example_translation: È entusiasta di giocare a tennis e pratica ogni giorno.

definition: in a kind and gentle manner
definition_translation: in modo gentile e mite
example: She spoke to me kindly and offered to help.
example_translation: Mi ha parlato ordinalmente e mi ha offerto aiuto.

definition: full of energy and enthusiasm; active and lively
definition_translation: pieno di energia e entusiasmo; attivo e vivace
example: The lively music made everyone want to dance.
example_translation: La musica vivace ha fatto volere ballare a tutti.

definition: feeling sad and alone; without companions or friends
definition_translation: sentimento triste e solo; senza compagni o amici
example: He felt lonely after moving to a new city.
example_translation: Si sentiva solo dopo essersi trasferito in una nuova città.

definition: having a changing or unpredictable mood
definition_translation: avere un umore cambiante o imprevedibile
example: He can be moody sometimes, but I love him anyway.
example_translation: Può essere umorale a volte, ma lo amo comunque.

definition: expressing or implying criticism, disapproval, or refusal
definition_translation: esprimendo o implicando critica, disapprovazione o rifiuto
example: He had a negative reaction to the idea.
example_translation: Ha avuto una reazione negativa all'idea.

definition: feeling anxious or worried; having or showing anxiety or fear
definition_translation: sentimento ansioso o preoccupato; avendo o mostrando ansia o paura
example: She was nervous before her first performance.
example_translation: Era nervosa prima della sua prima esibizione.

definition: able to accept and tolerate delays, problems, or suffering without becoming annoyed or upset
definition_translation: in grado di accettare e tollerare ritardi, problemi o sofferenze senza diventare irritato o sconvolto
example: The patient waited for hours to see the doctor.
example_translation: Il paziente ha aspettato per ore per vedere il medico.

definition: in a polite and respectful manner
definition_translation: in modo cortese e rispettoso
example: She spoke to me politely and thanked me for my help.
example_translation: Mi ha parlato cortesemente e mi ha ringraziato per il mio aiuto.

definition: having a lot of strength, influence, or authority
definition_translation: avendo molta forza, influenza o autorità
example: The powerful engine allowed the car to go very fast.
example_translation: Il motore potente ha consentito alla macchina di andare molto veloce.

definition: feeling pleased and satisfied with oneself or one's achievements
definition_translation: sentimento di piacere e soddisfazione con se stessi o i propri successi
example: He was proud of his accomplishments and felt happy.
example_translation: Era orgoglioso dei suoi successi e si sentiva felice.

definition: given to arguing or fighting; having a tendency to quarrel
definition_translation: dato a litigare o combattere; avendo una tendenza a litigare
example: He was a quarrelsome person and always got into fights.
example_translation: Era una persona litigiosa e sempre si inseriva in litigi.

definition: feeling or showing a state of calmness or comfort; not anxious or tense
definition_translation: sentimento o dimostrazione di uno stato di calma o comfort; non ansioso o teso
example: She felt relaxed after taking a warm bath.
example_translation: Si sentiva rilassata dopo essersi fatta un bagno caldo.

definition: causing a feeling of relaxation or calmness
definition_translation: causando un sentimento di rilassamento o calma
example: Listening to music is relaxing for me.
example_translation: Ascoltare la musica è rilassante per me.

definition: able to be trusted or depended on; consistent in performance or behavior
definition_translation: in grado di essere fidato o dipendente; coerente nella prestazione o comportamento
example: The reliable car has never broken down on me.
example_translation: La macchina affidabile non si è mai rotta con me.

definition: relating to or characterized by romance; having a strong feeling of love or attachment
definition_translation: relativo o caratterizzato da romanticismo; avendo un forte sentimento d'amore o attaccamento
example: The romantic movie made her cry.
example_translation: Il film romantico l'ha fatta piangere.

definition: not polite or respectful; impolite or insulting
definition_translation: non cortese o rispettoso; scortese o insultante
example: He was rude to the waiter and didn't tip.
example_translation: È stato scortese con il cameriere e non ha lasciato la mancia.

definition: feeling happy or content with something; pleased or gratified
definition_translation: sentimento felice o contento con qualcosa; soddisfatto o gratificato
example: She was satisfied with the hotel service.
example_translation: Era soddisfatta del servizio dell'albergo.

definition: feeling fear or anxiety; afraid
definition_translation: sentimento di paura o ansia; spaventato
example: The child was scared of the dark.
example_translation: Il bambino era spaventato del buio.

definition: causing fear or alarm; frightening
definition_translation: causando paura o allarme; spaventoso
example: The scary movie made her jump.
example_translation: Il film spaventoso l'ha fatta saltare.

definition: having a strong belief in one's own abilities or judgment
definition_translation: avendo una forte convinzione nelle proprie capacità o giudizio
example: He is self-confident and always takes risks.
example_translation: È autorevole e sempre si assume rischi.

definition: having or showing an excessive concern for one's own needs and desires
definition_translation: avendo o mostrando un eccessivo interesse per le proprie esigenze e desideri
example: He was selfish and never shared his toys.
example_translation: Era egoista e non divideva mai i suoi giocattoli.

definition: having or showing good sense or judgment; reasonable
definition_translation: avendo o mostrando buon senso o giudizio; ragionevole
example: She is sensible and always makes wise decisions.
example_translation: È sensibile e sempre prende decisioni sagge.

definition: feeling or showing great surprise, astonishment, or dismay
definition_translation: sentimento o dimostrazione di grande sorpresa, astonishment o costernazione
example: I was shocked when I heard the news.
example_translation: Ero scioccato quando ho sentito la notizia.

definition: causing great surprise, astonishment, or dismay
definition_translation: causando grande sorpresa, astonishment o costernazione
example: The shocking news made everyone cry.
example_translation: La notizia scioccante ha fatto piangere tutti.

definition: feeling nervous or uncomfortable in the presence of others; bashful
definition_translation: sentimento nervoso o scomodo in presenza di altri; timido
example: She is shy and doesn't speak up in class.
example_translation: È timida e non si esprime in classe.

definition: foolish or absurd; playful or mischievous
definition_translation: folle o assurdo; giocoso o discolo
example: He is silly and always makes jokes.
example_translation: È sciocco e sempre fa battute.

definition: having or showing a great deal of intelligence or common sense
definition_translation: avendo o mostrando una grande quantità di intelligenza o senso comune
example: She is smart and always gets good grades.
example_translation: È intelligente e sempre prende buoni voti.

definition: enjoying the company of others; friendly and outgoing
definition_translation: godendo della compagnia degli altri; amichevole e estroversa
example: He is sociable and always attends parties.
example_translation: È sociabile e sempre partecipa alle feste.

definition: feeling anxious or overwhelmed; under pressure
definition_translation: sentimento ansioso o sovraccaricato; sotto pressione
example: She was stressed about the upcoming exam.
example_translation: Era stressata per l'imminente esame.

definition: causing anxiety or pressure; difficult or trying
definition_translation: causando ansia o pressione; difficile o impegnativo
example: The stressful job made her quit.
example_translation: Il lavoro stressante l'ha fatta dimettere.

definition: demanding or enforcing severe standards or rules
definition_translation: richiedendo o applicando standard o regole severe
example: The strict teacher always gives homework.
example_translation: L'insegnante stretto sempre da compiti a casa.

definition: causing surprise or astonishment; unexpected
definition_translation: causando sorpresa o astonishment; inaspettato
example: The surprising news made everyone happy.
example_translation: La notizia sorprendente ha reso felice tutti.

definition: in a surprising or unexpected way
definition_translation: in modo sorprendente o inaspettato
example: She surprisingly passed the exam.
example_translation: Ha sorprendentemente superato l'esame.

definition: Having a natural ability or skill, especially in a particular area.
definition_translation: Avere un'abilità naturale o una competenza, soprattutto in un particolare campo.
example: She was a talented singer who had been performing since she was a child. She will be performing at the concert tonight. She had performed at the Grammy Awards last year.
example_translation: Era una cantante talentuosa che aveva iniziato a esibirsi fin da bambina. Si esibirà al concerto stasera. Aveva cantato agli Grammy Awards l'anno scorso.

definition: Feeling extreme fear or anxiety.
definition_translation: Provare paura o ansia estrema.
example: I was terrified of spiders when I was a child. I am terrified of heights. I was terrified of public speaking last year.
example_translation: Ero terrorizzato dai ragni quando ero bambino. Sono terrorizzato dalle altezze. Ero terrorizzato dal parlare in pubblico l'anno scorso.

definition: Causing a feeling of physical or mental exhaustion.
definition_translation: Provocare un senso di stanchezza fisica o mentale.
example: The hike was tiring, but the view was worth it. I find this job tiring. This class was tiring last semester.
example_translation: La passeggiata era stancante, ma la vista ne era valsa la pena. Trovo questo lavoro stancante. Questa classe era stancante il semestre scorso.

definition: Willing to accept or allow something, even if you do not agree with it.
definition_translation: Disposto ad accettare o permettere qualcosa, anche se non sei d'accordo.
example: She was tolerant of her sister's opinions, even when they disagreed. He is tolerant of criticism. They were tolerant of each other's differences.
example_translation: Era tollerante delle opinioni di sua sorella, anche quando erano in disaccordo. È tollerante delle critiche. Erano tolleranti delle reciproche differenze.

definition: Not expected or predicted.
definition_translation: Non previsto o predetto.
example: The unexpected news shocked everyone. I had an unexpected visit from an old friend yesterday. She had an unexpected promotion last month.
example_translation: La notizia inaspettata ha scioccato tutti. Ho avuto una visita inaspettata da un vecchio amico ieri. Ha avuto una promozione inaspettata lo scorso mese.

definition: Not showing kindness or welcoming behavior.
definition_translation: Non mostrare gentilezza o comportamento accogliente.
example: The unfriendly waiter made us feel unwelcome. She was unfriendly to her colleagues. The hotel staff were unfriendly and rude.
example_translation: Il cameriere ostile ci ha fatto sentire non graditi. Era ostile ai suoi colleghi. Lo staff dell'hotel era ostile e scortese.

definition: Not showing interest or enthusiasm.
definition_translation: Non mostrare interesse o entusiasmo.
example: He seemed uninterested in the conversation. She was uninterested in the movie. They were uninterested in the project.
example_translation: Sembrava disinteressato alla conversazione. Era disinteressata al film. Erano disinteressati al progetto.

definition: Not engaging or captivating.
definition_translation: Non coinvolgente o affascinante.
example: The uninteresting lecture put me to sleep. The movie was uninteresting and boring. The book was uninteresting and I didn't finish it.
example_translation: La noiosa lezione mi ha addormentato. Il film è stato noioso e annoiante. Il libro era noioso e non l'ho finito.

definition: Not showing kindness or compassion.
definition_translation: Non mostrare gentilezza o compassione.
example: Her unkind words hurt my feelings. He was unkind to his brother. They were unkind to the new student.
example_translation: Le parole scortesi le hanno ferito i sentimenti. È stato scortese con suo fratello. Erano scortesi con il nuovo studente.

definition: Having a moderate or comfortable temperature.
definition_translation: Avendo una temperatura moderata o comoda.
example: The warm weather was perfect for the beach. She felt warm and cozy in her blanket. The warm coffee was just what I needed.
example_translation: Il tempo caldo era perfetto per la spiaggia. Si sentiva calda e accogliente nella sua coperta. Il caffè caldo era proprio ciò di cui avevo bisogno.
